original_title: Libellula gentile. Fabio Pusterla, il lavoro del poeta
overview: A film about the Swiss Italian poet Fabio Pusterla and his creative poetic process, his struggle to find an honest language, one which adheres to the personal experience and is able to unfold a hidden truth that creates a strong and profound bond with the other, with his public.
title: Libellula gentile. Fabio Pusterla, il lavoro del poeta
